name: Hybrid-KMeans
paper: A Hybrid Semi-Supervised Anomaly Detection Model for High-Dimensional Data
description: Hybrid semi-supervised anomaly detection model for high-dimensional data that consists of two parts: a deep autoencoder (DAE) and an ensemble k-nearest neighbor graphs (K-NNG) based anomaly detector.
bibtex: @article{https://doi.org/10.1155/2017/8501683,author = {Song, Hongchao and Jiang, Zhuqing and Men, Aidong and Yang, Bo},title = {A Hybrid Semi-Supervised Anomaly Detection Model for High-Dimensional Data},journal = {Computational Intelligence and Neuroscience},volume = {2017},number = {1},pages = {8501683},doi = {https://doi.org/10.1155/2017/8501683},year = {2017}}
